intro.text: A Day in the Office: The ERNIan Adventure
You’re an ERNIan ready to tackle the day, but as with any great adventure, things don’t go as planned!
(Customize your character, then we’ll head to the office.)

ch1.text: You arrive at the ERNI office. Your access card isn’t working.
You ring the bell. Anna P. is on her way, but you’ll have to keep your footing until she arrives!

ch2.text: Inside at last—but HR spots you.
We need yesterday’s ATR evidence, and that you book all your hours in SAP!
Time to gracefully weave through bureaucracy.

ch3.text: At your desk… someone else is sitting there.
Words are exchanged. Diplomacy? Determination? A duel of desks ensues!

ch4.text: Screens are dead. You call service desk. Alfredo is on the way.
Until then, reroute the cables like a pro.

ch5.text: Kitchen run! The machine is empty. Refill it with beans and water without spilling a drop.

ch6.text: Your reserved room is occupied. Negotiations begin… with style.

ch7.text: The smell of churros fills the air. Sprint to the kitchen and beat the crowd!

ch8.text: It’s freezing. Reach Reception to request the temperature be raised—or snag a cozy hoodie from Marketing.
Avoid the icy AC blasts along the way!

conclusion.text: The Epic Day: you conquered tech issues, HR demands, and even scored a churro!
By the end, you’re not just an ERNIan; you’re a hero of the office.
